title: All Teichmuller spaces are not starlike
abstract:
This paper is the final step in solving the problem of starlikeness of
Teichmuller spaces in Bers' embedding. This step concerns the case of finite
dimensional Teichmuller spaces ${\mathbf T}(g, n)$ of positive dimension
(corresponding to punctured Riemann surfaces of finite conformal type $(g, n)$
with $2g - 2 + n > 0$).
